resources.string: Mobile Device Sensor by Fraunhofer CESE

This app collects data to study mobile device cybersecurity. This data to help users be more secure when using mobile devices.

The app collects information such as which other apps are running, the device's GPS location, and when a call is received.

This app DOES NOT collect sensitive content, such as your contact list, the content of SMS messages, or your browsing history.
This application uses the Funf Open Sensing Framework licensed under the GNU Lesser GPL.\n\n This application was developed by the Fraunhofer CESE. For any questions, email llayman@fc-md.umd.edu.
